#summary Specification
#labels Featured

= 1 Supported tags =

Full list of tags:

 == 1.1 @class ==

Format: 

*@class [class-name] [class-description]*

*class-name* : Full class name

*class-description*: Class description

Example: 

{{{
/**
 * @class SamplePackage.MyClass
 * This is a sample class
 */
}}}


 == 1.2 @extends ==

This tag is used in class declaration to specify class parent.

Format: 

*@extends [parent-class] [class-description]*

*parent-class* : Full class name

*class-description*: Current class (!) description

Example: 

{{{
/**
 * @class SamplePackage.MyClass
 * @extends SamplePackage.ParentClass
 * This is a sample class (this is a description of SamplePackage.MyClass!)
 */
}}}
